verses.verse: Praise <WH1984> Yah! <WH3050> Blessed <WH835> is the man <WH376> who fears <WH3372> Yahweh, <WH3050> who delights <WH2654> greatly <WH3966> in his commandments. <WH4687>
His seed <WH2233> will be mighty <WH1368> in the land. <WH776> The generation <WH1755> of the upright <WH3477> will be blessed. <WH1288>
Wealth <WH1952> and riches <WH6239> are in his house. <WH1004> His righteousness <WH6666> endures <WH5975> forever. <WH5703>
Light <WH216> dawns <WH2224> in the darkness <WH2822> for the upright, <WH3477> gracious, <WH2587> merciful, <WH7349> and righteous. <WH6662>
It is well <WH2896> with the man <WH376> who deals graciously <WH2603> and lends. <WH3867> He will maintain <WH3557> his cause <WH1697> in judgment. <WH4941>
For he will never <WH5769> be shaken. <WH4131> The righteous <WH6662> will be remembered <WH2143> forever. <WH5769>
He will not be afraid <WH3372> of evil <WH7451> news. <WH8052> His heart <WH3820> is steadfast, <WH3559> trusting <WH982> in Yahweh. <WH3068>
His heart <WH3820> is established. <WH5564> He will not be afraid <WH3372> in the end when he sees <WH7200> his adversaries. <WH6862>
He has dispersed, <WH6340> he has given <WH5414> to the poor. <WH34> His righteousness <WH6666> endures <WH5975> forever. <WH5703> His horn <WH7161> will be exalted <WH7311> with honor. <WH3519>

The wicked <WH7563> will see <WH7200> it, <WH3707> and be grieved. He shall gnash <WH2786> with his teeth, <WH8127> and melt away. <WH4549> The desire <WH8378> of the wicked <WH7563> will perish. <WH6>
